pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Jack o' Lantern, 1 Brush, 1 Bark Enforced Sproutling, 1 Sproutling, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 275 Sun value.

pages.title: Snipers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Putts a pumpkin that transforms mobs into friendly pumpkin zombies that explode on death.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Projectile converts a Zombie into a Pumpkin Zombie, then needs to recharge.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Pumpkin Witch is a powerful arcane mage. For example, it can control its broom to clean the floor, cook, do the dishes...
